title: Networking Forum
description: Access to a cross-sector network for collaboration, shared insights, and policy engagement.

title: Multi-Sectoral Perspectives
description: Uniting governments, industry, SMEs, individuals, and non-profits in open, neutral discussions on issues that impact everyone.

title: Reduced Rates
description: Discounted access to CIC events, workshops, and resources for members.

title: Access Information
description: Access to curated insights on circular economy, waste reduction, and resource recovery, with member-exclusive research and publications at free or reduced cost.

title: Stay Informed
description: Access to exclusive daily highlights covering global circular news, policy updates, partner events, and council announcements.

title: Influence
description: Influence the direction of CIC initiatives and priorities through active participation in working groups and committees.
